1.「芸で得られる よろこびなんか まやかしだぜ。| 覚えとけ。芸は なんの役にも立: I don't know what kind of joy you get from|your art. Learning... The arts are useless...

2.「……へへ 誰かと思ったら <cs_pchero>か。| 会いたかったぜ とーっ: Heh Look who's here<cs_pchero>I missed you. I've missed you, man.

3.「ポルファンの元で 修行してるってことは| お前も ご立派な教えに共感してんだろ: If you're training under Porphan, you must|share his noble teachings, right?

4.「芸は 人を救えるって アレだよ。: I've heard that art can save people's lives.

5.「……ハンッ クソが！ イライラさせやがる！| どいつもこいつも甘ちゃんで ヘド: ... Goddamn it! You're driving me crazy!|They're all such spoiled little bastards.|It's disgusting!

6.「オレは 芸の無力さに絶望し| 闇芸人ルルルリーチ様に 尽くすと決めたのだ！: I despair at the powerlessness of my art, and|have decided to serve the dark comedian Lulu|Leach!

7.「いくぞ 弟弟子 <cs_pchero>よ！| 本当に芸で人を救えるのなら| そ: Come on, little brother<cs_pchero>Hey! If you can really save people with your|art, then prove it to me!

8.「……ククク。なかなか やるな。| だが それでは オレは止められんぞ。: ...... I can't... But that's not going to|stop me from...

10.「オレは 旅芸人を抹殺するため| 何度 ケガを負っても 復活する身体を| ルルル:
I was given a body by Lord Lululeach that|would resurrect itself no matter how many|times it was injured in order to eliminate|
|the traveling entertainers.

11.「弟弟子よ。お前の芸が いつわりでないのなら| 芸で人を救えるというのなら ポル: Brother... If your art is not a substitute,|if your art can save people, then let me do|what Porphan told me to do and make a joke!

12.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。 | それがわかるまで 何百回でも 何千回でも|: ... You can't save people with your art.|Until you understand that, I'm going to beat|you up a hundred times, a thousand times!

14.「ポルファンの言葉が いつわりでないのなら| このオレを 止めてみせろ！: If Porphan's words aren't a lie, let's see if|you can stop me!

15.「……やるじゃねえか。弟弟子よ。| お前の芸 確かに見せてもらったぜ。: I'll... I'll do it... Brother... I'm gonna|need to see what you can do...

17.「ひさしぶりに 人間のころの笑いを思いだした。| ははっ なかなか 面白かったよ: For the first time in a long time, I remember|laughing when I was human. That was pretty|funny...

18.「あ～あ せっかく キミの中にあった| 芸を憎む心を 利用してあげたのに。| ず: I'm going to use your hatred of art to my|advantage... It's so easy to lose...

19.「ルルルリーチ様は 人間のわりに| 邪悪なオーラを持っていた キミを気に入って|: Master Lululeach took a liking to you and|turned you into a demon because you had an|evil aura for a human.

20.「もう 用済みだねぇ。| だいぶ 旅芸人を殺してくれたみたいだし| そろそろ 死: I'm done with you. It seems you've killed a|lot of traveling entertainers, so it's time|for you to die...
